text: The Ladies Man is a 1961 American comedy movie directed by Jerry Lewis (who also stars) and starring Helen Traubel, Kathleen Freeman, Buddy Lester, George Raft, Harry James, Jack Kruschen, Mary LaRoche, Pat Stanley. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1961 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jerry Lewis
title: The Ladies Man (1961 movie)
